item.title: Ali Abdaal
item.description: Ali Abdaal Ali Abdaal is a educational YouTuber, known for his work making videos around medicine, university and creating a business.

item.title: Ed McCann
item.description: Ed McCann Ed McCann is the current president of the Institution of Civil Engineers; the 157th to hold the post.

item.title: Tiago Forte
item.description: Tiago Forte Tiago Forte is an an author and proprietor of the Second Brain method of thinking. His recent book, “Building a Second Brain”, was released in June 2022 and outlines his approach to building a system to offload, record and resurface information.
